feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2020-06-16: v.8 pre-release (7.9.13) is available at https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/releases/tag/v7.9.13
entry.content: I need your help to improve the BORIS stability. If you experimented a crash please report the log file! For details see the information on the release page. Thank you for your collaboration!
entry.summary: I need your help to improve the BORIS stability. If you experimented a crash please report the log file! For details see the information on the release page. Thank you for your collaboration!

entry.title: 2020-01-14: v. 7.9.7 is available
entry.content: v. 7.9.7 is available. Add 'No focal subject' (when needed) in observations list and fixed various bugs. see revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history
entry.summary: v. 7.9.7 is available. Add 'No focal subject' (when needed) in observations list and fixed various bugs. see revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history

entry.title: 2019-11-21: v. 7.9.4 is available
entry.content: v. 7.9.4 is available. Fixed bugs and functions added. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history
entry.summary: v. 7.9.4 is available. Fixed bugs and functions added. see revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history

entry.title: 2019-11-04: v. 7.9.1 is available
entry.content: v. 7.9.1 is available. Fixed bug in Advanced event filtering function
entry.summary: v. 7.9.1 is available. Fixed bug in Advanced event filtering function
